comments:
Manifest editor fails with the following error when trying to open a manifest.mf
file in Turkish Locale.
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.plugin.ManifestEditor.createResourceContexts(ManifestEditor.java:59)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.PDEFormEditor.createInputContexts(PDEFormEditor.java:177)

This is happens because the String.toLowerCase() converts uppercase I to a
dotless lowercase i in Turkish Locale.Removing toLowerCase() and replacing
String.equals() between lines 45-57 in ManifestEditor with the
String.equalsIgnoreCase() may solve the problem.
Fixed all String.toLowerCase().  Tested on Turkish, manifests open.
